name: Gwoemul
description: Boo, It's me, Gwoemul, I love to scare myself by playing video games alone in the dark. My favourite scary movie is Jaws, I am terrified of the big scary sharks!

name: Spogelse
description: Bonjour, I go by the name of Spogelse, Halloween is my favourite time of the year, I enjoy being especially spooky and love to spend time staying in haunted hotels. The greatest Halloween ever was when I dressed up like a magic Unicorn and snuck into the local zoo to kiss a crocodile as a dare! My favourite scary movie is E.T

name: Sylvia Ganush
description: Boo, I go by the name of Sylvia Ganush, Halloween is my favourite holiday of the year, I love to dance the monster mash. My favourite scary movie is Nightmare on Elm Street!

name: Autumn
description: Spooky greetings to you, I'm Autumn, every Halloween I love to dress my pug dogs up as spiders and parade them around the park. My favourite scary movie is The Grinch!
